item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: 4/21/2016
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis: 4/21/2016

Bitcoin has reached a significant long-term resistance line. At that level the market will decide upon medium- and long-term directions. Continuing its movement along the upward trend, Bitcoin's price has reached an important resistance line. That level is significant for traders with both long- and medium-term positions.

item.title: How to invest in Bitcoin & the future of Bitcoin?
item.description:
How to invest in Bitcoin & the future of Bitcoin?

Bitcoin investing can be done in many ways. In the interview for the Bitcoin Whale Club, Simon Dixon, CEO BnkToTheFuture.com, discusses the different opportu...

item.title: Apple Pay and Bitcoin Are No Match for Harriet Tubman's $20 Bill
item.description:
Apple Pay and Bitcoin Are No Match for Harriet Tubman's $20 Bill

In replacing Andrew Jackson on the $20 bill, Harriet Tubman is getting pride of place in the American wallet. Despite hype for Apple Pay, Bitcoin, and other alternative payment methods, cash is still king for the vast majority of Americans.

item.title: Bitcoin Q&A: The End of Mining Centralization- From 1000x increases to hitting Moore's "Wall".
item.description:
Bitcoin Q&A: The End of Mining Centralization- From 1000x increases to hitting Moore's "Wall".

item.title: Farewell! And May the Currency Competition Be With You
item.description: Farewell! And May the Currency Competition Be With You

item.title: Q&A: Coinbase CEO thinks Bitcoin offers much more promise than peril
item.description:
Q&A: Coinbase CEO thinks Bitcoin offers much more promise than peril

Posted: 04/21/2016 05:56:25 AM PDT Updated: 04/21/2016 07:09:19 AM PDT Brian Armstrong is a Bitcoin believer. Given half a chance, he'll talk unceasingly about the virtues of the virtual currency. He's so into Bitcoin that he takes his paycheck entirely in the virtual currency and has a special debit card that allows him to pay with Bitcoin -- indirectly at least -- when he goes to the mall.

item.title: FBI Used Invalid Warrant To Infect Tor Website With Malware
item.description:
FBI Used Invalid Warrant To Infect Tor Website With Malware

Malware is a grave threat to computer users all over the world, and even law enforcement does not shy away from using this technique to hack Tor and obtain sensitive information. But at a recent Massachusetts court has determined, this method of acquiring evidence is not legal.

item.title: Russian Finance Ministry's Bitcoin Ban Bill Delayed, Due to Criticism
item.description:
Russian Finance Ministry's Bitcoin Ban Bill Delayed, Due to Criticism

The draft law proposed by the Ministry of Finance in Russia to ban the circulation of cryptocurrencies like bitcoin in the Russian Federation is delayed in its entry to the State Duma. A proposal by the Finance Ministry that is seeking to officially ban bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in Russia has hit a delay.

item.title: Decentralized, Peer-To-Peer Bitcoin Exchange Bitsquare to Launch Next Week
item.description:
Decentralized, Peer-To-Peer Bitcoin Exchange Bitsquare to Launch Next Week

Having been in development for more than two years, what promises to be the first proper decentralized Bitcoin exchange is set to officially launch next Wednesday. Bitsquare, an open source project led by the Austrian-born Manfred Karrer, allows anyone to trade Bitcoin for fiat currency as well as altcoins, without requiring a company, central intermediary or permission from anyone.

item.title: This Story About a Florida Man Involves Bitcoin and J.P. Morgan
item.description:
This Story About a Florida Man Involves Bitcoin and J.P. Morgan

A Florida man was arrested on Thursday for participating in a bribery scheme aimed at supporting an illegal bitcoin exchange operated by his son and owned by an Israeli behind a series of hacking attacks on organizations such as J.P. Morgan Chase .
